verses.verse: These are the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> to <S%H3772>make<s%> with the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, besides the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> which he <S%H3772>made<s%> with them in <S%H2722>Horeb<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> unto all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7200>them<s%>, Ye have seen all that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and unto all his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and unto all his <S%H776>land<s%>;
the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4531>trials<s%> which thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%>, the <S%H226>signs<s%>, and those <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4159>wonders<s%>:

but <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath not <S%H5414>given<s%> you a <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%>, and <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%>, and <S%H241>ears<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%>, unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And I have <S%H3212>led<s%> you <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>: your <S%H8008>clothes<s%> are not waxed <S%H1086>old<s%> upon <S%H5275>you<s%>, and thy shoe is not waxed <S%H1086>old<s%> upon thy <S%H7272>foot<s%>.

Ye have not <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>, neither have ye <S%H8354>drunk<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> or strong <S%H7941>drink<s%>; that ye may <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.

And when ye <S%H935>came<s%> unto this <S%H4725>place<s%>, <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>, and <S%H5747>Og<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, came <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> us unto <S%H4421>battle<s%>, and we smote <S%H5221>them<s%>:

and we <S%H3947>took<s%> their <S%H776>land<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> it for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> unto the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%>, and to the <S%H1425>Gadites<s%>, and to the <S%H2677>half<s%> - <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of the <S%H4520>Manassites<s%>.
Keep <S%H8104><s%> therefore the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H7919>them<s%>, that ye may prosper in all that ye <S%H6213>do<s%>.

Ye <S%H5324>stand<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> all of you <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>; your <S%H7218>heads<s%>, your <S%H7626>tribes<s%>, your <S%H2205>elders<s%>, and your <S%H7860>officers<s%>, even all the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>,

your little <S%H2945>ones<s%>, your <S%H802>wives<s%>, and thy <S%H1616>sojourner<s%> that is <S%H7130>in<s%> the midst of thy <S%H4264>camps<s%>, from the <S%H2404>hewer<s%> of thy <S%H6086>wood<s%> unto the <S%H7579>drawer<s%> of thy <S%H4325>water<s%>;

that thou mayest <S%H5674>enter<s%> into the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, and into his <S%H423>oath<s%>, which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3772>maketh<s%> with thee this <S%H3117>day<s%>;

that he may <S%H6965>establish<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day<s%> unto himself for a <S%H5971>people<s%>, and that he may be unto thee a <S%H430>God<s%>, as he <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H7650>thee<s%>, and as he sware unto thy <S%H1>fathers<s%>, to <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, to <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, and to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.
Neither with you only do I <S%H3772>make<s%> this <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and this <S%H423>oath<s%>,

but with him that <S%H5975>standeth<s%> here with us <S%H3426>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, and also with him that is not here with us this <S%H3117>day<s%>

(for ye <S%H3045>know<s%> how we <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and how we <S%H5674>came<s%> <S%H7130>through<s%> the midst of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> through which ye <S%H7130>passed<s%>;
and ye have <S%H7200>seen<s%> their <S%H8251>abominations<s%>, and their <S%H1544>idols<s%>, <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H68>stone<s%>, <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%>, which were among them);

lest there should <S%H3426>be<s%> among you <S%H376>man<s%>, or <S%H802>woman<s%>, or <S%H4940>family<s%>, or <S%H7626>tribe<s%>, whose <S%H3824>heart<s%> turneth <S%H6437>away<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> from <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> of those <S%H1471>nations<s%>; lest there should <S%H3426>be<s%> among you a <S%H8328>root<s%> that <S%H6509>beareth<s%> <S%H7219>gall<s%> and <S%H3939>wormwood<s%>;

and it come to <S%H8085>pass<s%>, when he heareth the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H423>curse<s%>, that he <S%H1288>bless<s%> himself in his <S%H3824>heart<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, I shall have <S%H7965>peace<s%>, <S%H3588>though<s%> I <S%H3212>walk<s%> in the <S%H8307>stubbornness<s%> of my <S%H3820>heart<s%>, to <S%H5595>destroy<s%> the <S%H7302>moist<s%> with the <S%H6771>dry<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> <S%H14>will<s%> not <S%H5545>pardon<s%> <S%H639>him<s%>, but then the anger of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> and his <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> will <S%H6225>smoke<s%> against that <S%H376>man<s%>, and all the <S%H423>curse<s%> that is <S%H3789>written<s%> in this <S%H5612>book<s%> shall <S%H7257>lie<s%> upon <S%H3068>him<s%>, and Jehovah will blot <S%H4229>out<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> from under <S%H8064>heaven<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will set him <S%H914>apart<s%> unto <S%H7451>evil<s%> out of all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, according to all the <S%H423>curses<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> that is <S%H3789>written<s%> in this <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%>.

And the <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H314>come<s%>, your <S%H1121>children<s%> that shall rise <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5237>you<s%>, and the foreigner that shall <S%H935>come<s%> from a <S%H7350>far<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>, shall <S%H559>say<s%>, when they <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H4347>plagues<s%> of that <S%H776>land<s%>, and the <S%H8463>sicknesses<s%> wherewith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath made it <S%H2470>sick<s%>;

and that the whole <S%H776>land<s%> thereof is <S%H1614>brimstone<s%>, and <S%H4417>salt<s%>, and a <S%H8316>burning<s%>, that it is not <S%H2232>sown<s%>, nor <S%H6779>beareth<s%>, nor any <S%H6212>grass<s%> <S%H5927>groweth<s%> <S%H4114>therein<s%>, like the overthrow of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%>, <S%H126>Admah<s%> and <S%H6636>Zeboiim<s%>, which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H2015>overthrew<s%> in his <S%H639>anger<s%>, and in his <S%H2534>wrath<s%>:

even all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%>, Wherefore hath <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6213>done<s%> thus unto this <S%H776>land<s%>? what meaneth the <S%H2750>heat<s%> of this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%>?

Then men shall <S%H559>say<s%>, Because they forsook the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, which he <S%H3772>made<s%> with them when he brought them <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>,

and <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, and <S%H7812>worshipped<s%> <S%H430>them<s%>, gods that they <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H2505>not<s%>, and that he had not given unto them:

therefore the <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against this <S%H776>land<s%>, to <S%H935>bring<s%> upon it all the <S%H7045>curse<s%> that is <S%H3789>written<s%> in this <S%H5612>book<s%>;

and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H5428>rooted<s%> them out of their <S%H127>land<s%> in <S%H639>anger<s%>, and in <S%H2534>wrath<s%>, and in <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7110>indignation<s%>, and <S%H7993>cast<s%> them into <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>, as at this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

The <S%H5641>secret<s%> things belong unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>; but the things that are <S%H1540>revealed<s%> belong unto us and to our <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>, that we may <S%H6213>do<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H8451>law<s%>.
